goal.ch: "修完本課程，學生應能1. 明白和使用基本的日常用語和極其簡單的句子，滿足日常生活上一些非常具體的需求，如：介紹自己與他人、購物、生活作息；2. 聽懂簡單社交談話，假使對方講的德文是很清楚且緩慢的；3. 閱讀書信，並能截取重要資訊以及掌握其主旨；"
goal.en: "On successful completion of this course, students will be able to1. understand and use familiar, everyday expressions and very simple sentences, which relate to the satisfying of concrete needs of daily life such as introducing themselves and others, shopping and talking about daily routine; 2. understand daily conversations, if the person they are speaking to speaks slowly and clearly and is willing to help;3. understand letters and grasp their gist and most important information;"

outline.ch: 上學期課程將以Menschen A1.1第一至十二課為主要學習內容，並搭配作業本練習，內容涵蓋問候、個人資料、家庭、購物、休閒活動、飲食、約定、旅遊、日行程、節慶等。上課方式將採用大量互動會話方式，讓學生具備運用基礎德語之能力與德語國家文化的知識。
outline.en: "In the first semester lessons 1 to 12 of Menschen A1.1 will be the main content. Together with practice exercises from the students workbook the lessons content covers greetings, personal information, family, shopping, leisure time activities, eating and drinking, appointments, traveling, daily schedule, festivals and so on. The largely interactive teaching style helps students to apply their basic german skills in conversations and to acquire knowledge about german culture."
